Key Match Events: Lisandro Martínez scored the opening goal for Argentina in the 35th minute
Kevin Rodríguez equalized for Ecuador in the 91st minute of stoppage time
Pre-Game Insights: Lionel Messi started the game despite being an injury doubt
Post-Match Reflections: Lionel Scaloni praised Emi Martinez's performance in the penalty shootout
Others: The match went to penalties after a 1-1 draw in regulation time
There is no extra time in Copa América knockout games apart from the final
Ecuador have never beaten Argentina at the Copa América
